subject: Re: [junit] Looking for some "Best Practices"
msgSnippet: So said  Mike Clark  on  2002-11-23 ... No need to apologize! The more opinions, the better. As I wrote, your opinion is always welcome. J. B. Rainsberger,
messageBody:
So said Mike Clark on 2002-11-23

>J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>
>>So said Mike Clark on 2002-11-23
>>
>>>J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>>>
>>>If you're asking me...
>>
>>It never hurts to get your perspective, Mike.
>>
>>Now for the original poster?
>
>Apologies for the unsolicited opinion. It appeared to me you were
>replying to my post, not the OP.

No need to apologize! The more opinions, the better. As I wrote, your
opinion is always welcome.

J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
